rpgSource

Class LivingThings

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgSource.LivingThings
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    class LivingThings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains everything an entity in a battle should have.
    Author:
    FlightGuy

    • Method Detail

      • reduceHealth

        double reduceHealth(double damage)
        This method reduces the health of the entity its ran on based damage and its defense.
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage the attack would do if defense is ignored.
        Returns:
        The entity's new current health.

      • reduceHealthRecoil

        double reduceHealthRecoil(double inputRecoil)
        This method reduces health on an entity that uses a move that inflicts recoil damage.
        Parameters:
        inputRecoil - The damage the recoil will do to the entity. Defense is ignored.
        Returns:
        The entity's new current health.

      • dodgeAttack

        double dodgeAttack(double damage)
        This method determines if attack to an entity hits it or misses it.
        Parameters:
        damage - The damaage an incoming attack would deal if the attack hits and defense is ignored.
        Returns:
        If the attack misses 0. If the attack hits, the damage the attack would deal if defense is ignored.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This method returns the entity's name.
        Returns:
        The entity's name.
